LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.0.label: traveled the world
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.0.description: There is nothing as exhilarating as seeing what the world has to offer.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.1.label: traveled the world
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.1.description: Travelling is amazing. Seeing the sights, discovering new lands... The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.2.label: traveled the world
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.2.description: It's been a few days since I travelled. I loved it.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.3.label: traveled the world
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Desired.stages.3.description: I have a fond memory of my past travels.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.0.label: had to leave the colony
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.0.description: I despise travelling. Leaving the security of our colony is terrible.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.1.label: had to leave the colony
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.1.description: The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind. I hated it.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.2.label: had to leave the colony
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.2.description: It's been a few days since I travelled. I hated it.
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.3.label: had to leave the colony
LanguageData.VME_Travel_Despised.stages.3.description: I have uncomfortable memories of my past travels.
